entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
